title: Unemployment rate in Hungary 2019
summary: In general Unemployment rate has fallen over the Year.
Unemployment rate is roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, and finally slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2015.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum Unemployment rate, about 11.03 was reported at Year 2011
The lowest Unemployment rate, of value 6.81 was reported at Year 2015
min_summary: Overall Unemployment rate has decreased over the Year.
Unemployment rate is roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, and finally slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2015.
